scenario_text.value: Hey, uh... Um, Takuma... Takuma!

Huh? What’s that? Where’s that voice coming
from?
Over here! Hey, Takuma, look behind you!
Uwah! Shuuji! Don’t sneak up on me like that!
Shhh! You weren’t followed, were you?

No, I wasn’t followed. What are you even
doing out here?

I, uh, well... I was just walking quietly
behind you.

Sounds like you’re the one who was following
me.

No! It wasn’t like that! I just had something
I wanted to talk with you about. Privately.
With me?
Yes, with you!

(I don’t know what Shuuji is thinking. This
is kinda creepy.)

It’s just...well, you know... That time
I almost lost it...

...you’re the one who brought me back to my
senses. I just wanted to say thanks.

And I didn’t want it to seem forced or
anything.
Right...

(Sounds like Shuuji’s pride is making this
hard for him. He’s not being very clear.)

(Still, I ought to reply to him somehow. Let
me think...)
How should I respond to Shuuji?
Don’t worry about it.
We got each other.
That’s weird.
Listen, don’t worry about it, Shuuji.

No, I feel like this is the sort of thing
that needs to be done properly.

(Funny. He hasn’t chosen a very proper way of
doing it.)

And anyway, I don’t want people thinking I’m
useless anymore.
(Shuuji...)

Hey, don’t worry about it. We’ve got each
other’s backs. That’s all there is to it.
I’m not sure that’s really...

Besides, you’re one of the few friends I have
in this world who I know I can count on.
What? You mean...you consider me a friend?

Sure, that just goes without saying. What
else would you be?

Anyway, Shuuji, if you notice the same thing
happening to me, I’ll be counting on you.

Right, okay. I won’t let you down. Still...
Heheheh...
Shuuji?
Friends, huh? Yeah...friends...
Well, that’s weird, but okay.
W-weird?! Wh-what do you mean weird?
Oh, nothing serious, really. It’s just...

Lopmon had a lot more to do with how things
turned out than anyone.

So rather than thanking me, I think you
should be showing Lopmon some affection.
Oh, uh... Yeah, well...
And by the way, did you thank the others too?

No, not yet. I was going to do that next.
It’s just, I feel so embarrassed...

Although, even if it is embarrassing, it’s
something I have to do. I’ll give it a go.
